summary:
I am looking for an in-house ERP consultancy or support opportunity. I am familiar with SAP ECC and S/4 HANA implementation (mainly in MM with extended knowledge of QM, PP, SD and FI/CO), SCM, warehouse management, system integration and business process improvement.

     Working with a multicultural team for years, I can easily fit in a various working environment. I am a dynamic and flexible worker, also a good communicator and team player. As a multicultural team leader, I am improving my leadership as well.

certifications.name: •	SAP Certified Application Associate – Procurement with SAP ERP 6.0 EHP4

company.name: Giant Europe B.V. & Giant Europe Manufacturing B.V.

profile_positions.description:
●	Leading and coaching a multicultural team which is composed of Application Manager, Developer and System Administrator in the Netherlands and Hungary.
●	Offering first line support from 2 manufacturing factories on SAP, WMS, MES and other surrounded systems.
●	Analyzing business requirements and developing new application solutions.
●	Coordinating with HQ IT team and 3rd party application providers.
●	Implementing SAP, WMS and MES
profile_positions.title: Manufacturing System Support Team Lead / Application Manager

profile_positions.description:
IT role
●	Managing all IT affairs in the company, including budget, network, servers, H/W, S/W and etc.
●	Cooperating with a local application provider to implement a WMS system.
●	Maintaining Oracle ERP system and troubleshooting.
●	Collecting requirements from users and developing solutions.
Operation role
●	Placing purchase order based on the sales performance and forecast.
●	Managing the sales pricing structure.
●	Monitoring inventory level.
●	Analyzing data and generating management reports.
profile_positions.title: IT/Operation Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Project:
●	MM/WM/QM consultant, SAP S/4HANA ERP Implementation, Medical Equipment Manufacturer
●	Winshuttle consultant, German HQ Data Migration Project (remote), Pharmaceutical Company

Main Tasks:
●	Assessing client’s current processes and systems, and proposing a potential solution.
●	Adopting Winshuttle solutions to fulfill SAP data management requirements, including uploading mass data via Excel templates, generating customized reports, and deploying workflows for SAP master data applications in a SharePoint-based website.
●	Introducing the HQ templates to other branches and analyzing the gaps among different operating units.
●	Taking requirements, hosting cross-functional meetings, and harmonizing processes for the whole group.
●	Cooperating with other consultants to develop overall solutions.
●	Configuring SAP system functionality, developing and executing testing plans.
●	Preparing user manuals and conducting training sessions for new business processes and operations.
●	Generating specifications and communicating with the programming team to fulfill customized requirements or system integration.
●	Defining, collecting and verifying legacy data to ensure the reliability of data conversion into SAP.
●	Creating customized reports by SAP standard reporting tools and ABAP codes.
●	SAP Go-Live support and troubleshooting.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Project:
●	MM consultant, SAP ERP Implementation – Netherlands Rollout, Server Technology Manufacturer

Main Tasks:
●	Introducing the HQ templates to clients’ multinational teams and analyzing the gaps among different operating units.
●	Taking requirements from users, hosting cross-functional meetings, and harmonizing processes for the whole group.
●	Cooperating with other consultants to develop overall solutions.
●	Configuring SAP system functionality, developing and executing testing plans.
●	Preparing user manuals and conducting training sessions for new business processes and operations.
●	Generating specifications and communicating with the programming team to fulfill customized requirements or system integration.
●	Defining, collecting and verifying legacy data to ensure the reliability of data conversion into SAP.
●	SAP Go-Live support and troubleshooting.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Project:
●	MM consultant, SAP ERP Implementation – Taiwan, Vietnam and Cambodia, Apparel industry
●	MM consultant, SAP ERP Implementation – USA Rollout, Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing

Main Tasks:
●	Assessing client’s current processes and proposing a potential solution before implementation.
●	Introducing the HQ templates to clients’ multinational teams and analyzing the gaps among different operating units.
●	Taking requirements from users, hosting cross-functional meetings, and harmonizing processes for the whole group.
●	Cooperating with other consultants to develop overall solutions.
●	Configuring SAP system functionality, developing and executing testing plans.
●	Preparing user manuals and conducting training sessions for new business processes and operations.
●	Generating specifications and communicating with the programming team to fulfill customized requirements or system integration.
●	Defining, collecting and verifying legacy data to ensure the reliability of data conversion into SAP.
●	Creating customized reports by SAP standard reporting tools and ABAP codes.
●	SAP Go-Live support and troubleshooting.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Project:
●	MM/QM consultant, SAP ERP Implementation – Philippines Rollout, Power Supply Manufacturing
●	MM consultant, SAP ERP Implementation, Semiconductor Equipment and Products Manufacturing
●	MM consultant, SAP ERP Implementation – Taiwan Rollout, Semiconductor Assembly and Test

Main Tasks:
●	Introducing the HQ templates to clients’ multinational teams.
●	Taking requirements from users and analyzing the process gaps between HQ and subsidiaries.
●	Following module leaders’ instructions to draft the solutions and project deliverables.
●	Configuring SAP system functionality and executing testing plans.
●	Preparing user manuals and conducting training sessions for new business processes and operations.
●	Working with the programming team to verify the customized programs.
●	Collecting and verifying legacy data to ensure the reliability of data conversion into SAP.
●	SAP Go-Live support and troubleshooting.
●	Assisting the project manager in project management affairs.
profile_positions.title: Analyst

profile_positions.description:
●	Maintaining financial systems and enhancing the functionality based on requirements.
●	Initiating Uniform Management System Project, including requirement collecting, system analysis, development, testing, and integration with workflow, finance, and inventory management system.
●	Conducting user training sessions to introduce the new system to the finance team.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description: Hardware compatibility, applicability, reliability, and effectivity test
profile_positions.title: Part-time Hardware Test Engineer
